page.title: 16School Log Book (cont)
page.content:
{1st. September 1939} School closed on 31st. August. Evacuation takes place this morning. The arrangements were carried out ccording to the plan prepared in June/July. The children from Osmondthorpe schools were evacuated to the Wetherby district. { {23rd. February 1940} Air Raid shelter accommodation is the Zoo.
{13th. April 1940} Whitsuntide holiday cancelled. All members of staff reported for duty this morning in accordance with instructions announced on the wireless.
{14th. May 1940 }School opened as usual this (Saturday) morning.
